prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating octahedron, crescent, wave spiral patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and Vesica Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor NIGRANA's profile: 'He who governs the 28 days of the moon', Aethyr DES, Earth element, Tarot The Moon, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Pisces, embodying the essence: 'In NIGRANA's presence, the world moves to a sacred rhythm half light, half darkness, each cycle intu...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who governs the 28 days of the moon'
profile_data.essence: In NIGRANA's presence, the world moves to a sacred rhythm half light, half darkness, each cycle intuitive and measured as if drawn by lunar tides at the edge of awareness.
profile_data.angelic_role: Virtue of Lunar Cycle; leads earth-forged legionaries.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted prismatic structure that shifts between solid and fluid states, representing the liminal nature of lunar consciousness and earth's crystalline memory
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silvery-blue reflects lunar essence and Yesod's watery nature, while indigo represents deep intuition and mystical vision
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Octahedron represents perfect balance, crescent mirrors lunar cycle, wave spiral embodies rhythmic transformation
